result.html: Ar mhaith leat dul chuig ceolchoirm liom Dé SathairnWould you like to go a concert with me on Saturday?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat dul ċuig ceolċoirm liom Dé SaṫairnWould you like to go a concert with me on Saturday?

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.html: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ponchtml: Anois ba ṁaiṫ liom cúpla ceist eile a ċur ort faoi ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.

result.eng: They turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.
result.ga: Tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféise
result.orig: Tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféise
result.html: Tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféiseThey turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.
result.ponchtml: Tiontaíonn siad cúis ṁaiṫ ina ceap áiféiseThey turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada

result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: As soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.orig: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.html: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ponchtml: Má tá teaċ mór agus culaiṫ ṁaiṫ éadaiġ aigesean altaíoḋ sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach

result.ponchtml: Ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: I'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh

result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom ḃeiṫ i mo ẛagart nuair a ṫiocfaḋ ann doṁI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.

result.eng: It is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
result.ga: Ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seo
